meanings.definition: Of poor quality or inferior; cheap or tacky.
meanings.sent1: The schlockey toy broke after just one day of playing.
meanings.sent2: The schlockey decorations at the party looked very unappealing.
meanings.sent3: The schlockey costume made everyone laugh at the Halloween party.
meanings.sent4: The schlockey painting reminded me of a child's first attempt at art.
meanings.sent5: The schlockey furniture fell apart as soon as we sat on it.

meanings.definition: To produce or create something of low quality or inferior design.
meanings.sent1: She decided to schlockey together a last-minute gift for her friend.
meanings.sent2: The company should not schlockey products just to save money.
meanings.sent3: He tried to schlockey a repair for the broken vase, but it looked worse than before.
meanings.sent4: The chef refused to schlockey the dish, insisting on using only the finest ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The artist didn't want to schlockey the painting, so he spent hours perfecting it.
